ai-tha-ap269:1.1_0: “Most people are on the bank of the rivers,
ai-tha-ap269:1.4_0: while walking along I glanced at her.
ai-tha-ap269:2.1_0: one should walk keeping one’s arms steady,
ai-tha-ap269:2.2_0: to look after, a great sage, a great sage.
ai-tha-ap269:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap269:3.4_0: And this is the fruit and result.
ai-tha-ap269:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap269:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bharadvāja.
ai-tha-ap269:6.1_0: He was fast as the seventh of the senior mendicants.
